name: Agent 001
description:
Agent 001

A top down shooter about Agent 001 who must brave the 1 bit world by avoiding the dangerous enemies on patrol all in the quest to rescue the sacred white flame!   All music was written with 1 bit restrictions, meaning, only 2 notes are ever played - F & B flat.

All artwork is done entirely in CSS and the new Minisprit.es tool.  No images were used.

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys : Movement

Mouse : Aiming

Space : Fire

See "More Information" for source code link, authors and license details

Notes for judging:

All music and artwork were created by the team in the minisprites tool and package, including the intro which is entirely CSS with 001 being produced from the string.
